channel.title: delta on On Point Custom Homes
channel.description: Recent content in delta on On Point Custom Homes

item.title: Briargrove Southern Charm Remodel: Part 2
item.description: Who doesn’t love a kitchen makeover?! This Briargrove home had a good footprint but needed some remodel love to make the room feel more timeless. On Point resurfaced the entire room to transform this family’s kitchen from drab to fab. All new paint, countertops, hardware, lighting, and sink + faucet goes a long way! Take a look at the final product below.
